module, connection, individual, activity, process plant
This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module to record a connection relationship between individual activities.
A connection between activities indicates that matter, energy, mechanical load or information can be transferred between them.
The relationship 'maintain for operation' between:
the individual activity 'maintain de-icing plant IC_27 on 2002-10-26'; and
the individual activity 'operate de-icing plant IC_27 during the winter of 2002/2003',
that indicates the maintenance activity puts de-icing plant IC_27 in a fit state for its subsequent use, is a Connection_of_individual_activity.
In this example, the state of de-icing plant IC_27 'flows' from one activity to the next.
a relationship between one individual activity and another that indicates the two are connected.
class of connection of activity; Class of connection of activity is within the scope of the Class_of_connection_of_activity application module.
classification of a connection relationship between activities; Classification of connection of activity is within the scope of the Activity_structure_and_classification application module.
The Connection_of_individual_activity UoF identifies a connection between individual activities and defines the individual activities that are connected.
